verbose_text: These results demonstrated that SCRT exerts its anti-inflammatory activities in LPS stimulated RAW 264.7 cells through decreasing the production of inflammatory mediators, including PGE 2, NO and cytokines, via suppression of the NF-kappaB and JNK and ERK1/2 signaling pathways.
evidence: LPS-stimulated RAW 264.7 cells through decreasing the production of inflammatory mediators, including PGE 2 , NO and cytokines, via suppression of the NF-kappaB
